name: Stackenblocken
description: Classic German-Style Oktoberfest brewed with imported Pilsner and Munich malts to impart a rich bready character. Two hours of boiling lends light caramel notes. German grown Hallertau Mittelfruh hops provide the herbal spicy balance that make this rich lager infinitely balanced and drinkable.
tasting: Malty & bready w/ caramel notes balanced w/ herbal spicy hop aroma
